## Notes

- Make template package(s) available as a [GitHub template repository](https://docs.github.com/en/github/creating-cloning-and-archiving-repositories/creating-a-template-repository).
- Consider contributing template packages for the following categories:
    + [Software](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/devel/BiocViews.html#___Software)
    + [Workflow](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/devel/BiocViews.html#___Workflow)
    + [AnnotationData](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/devel/BiocViews.html#___AnnotationData)
    + [ExperimentData](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/devel/BiocViews.html#___ExperimentData)
